'''1.13.2''' is a hotfix to {{el|be}} released only for iOS and iPadOS on November 14, 2019, which fixed a crash.<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360035931632-Minecraft-1-13-2-iOS-Only-|title=Minecraft - 1.13.2 (iOS Only)|date=November 14, 2019}}</ref>

== Fixes ==
* Fixed a crash that occurred when launching the game on iOS and iPadOS devices ({{bug|MCPE-54465}}).
